rules_text: Abstract. [i](Reveal a face-down card you own in exile, then put that card into your hand.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Aftermath [i](Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)[/i]
Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
Create two blood tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
